data.text: @StalkingLG @Delta Thank you for your message! Kindly allow me to look into this. Could you send me your booking code, full name, ticket number and e-mail address via a DM?

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

data.text:
Not an easy day to fly today. @Delta seemed to be in full meltdown mode with the delays from MSP.

Lucky to get a rebook and hopefully out to NWK

data.text: @Delta still need to be contacted regarding the mechanical issues. And currently 595 dollars away from silver but my flight will be in December and January. Thoughts?

data.text: @delta you let me check baggage, get through tsa and to the gate with a cancelled/voided ticket. All along the way the teams didn't bother until I needed a seat assignment. I ended up having to buy a new ticket at the gate. Your companion program is super flawed.

data.text: Hey @Delta what (if any) are the plans for faster and more reliable Wi-Fi on your regional planes (like the CRJ-900)? My regular LGA-YYZ has nearly unusable Wi-Fi.
